1.2.1.name: wordpress/city-feeds-widget
1.2.1.description: The city feeds widget is a simple plugin that allows you to pull your Zondervan OnTheCity.org plaza information into your wordpress website. Your plaza information is loaded via Ajax to prevent long page loads while waiting for the City to output the information. I wrote this plugin to integrate our plaza posts into our main website. I hope it blesses your organization. If you have any ideas for future releases, please email me (my address is in the plugin comments).
